long_description: The REI Sahara River cap helps you keep a cool head while paddling on the water or logging miles on the trail. Soft, breathable nylon fabric is lightweight and quick drying; polyester mesh side panels promote ventilation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Polyester sweatband wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. Foam-stiffened bill offers sun protection for your eyes and face; brim keeps the REI Sahara River cap afloat in water. Stretchy bungee in back fine-tunes the fit.
short_description: The REI Sahara River cap helps you keep a cool head while paddling on the water or logging miles on the trail.
